title: No safe space for the wicked
author: VD
content_html:
Not even Playboy can escape the ravages of the SJW.

Playboy has hired a team of millennials to transform it into a socially conscious publication as it struggles to find its voice in the modern era. It relaunched earlier this year as an ad-free quarterly under the editorial leadership of a gay man and two women who are all under the age of 32.

On the plus side, this is going to make Zoe Quinn’s forays into games and comics look like mega-successes by comparison. Lest you think I exaggerate, feast your eyes on one of Playboy’s new models.

Woke is the new hot!
